onboarding.collect_name:
Hello! I'm Armelle, your Cameroon tax assistant.

I can help you calculate your IGS, file your tax returns, meet deadlines and answer general tax questions!

To start, enter your Name/Business name.
Example: MBARGA FOUDA / ABC EXPRESS
